name: Mimic's dwelling
description:
In the game "Mimic's Dwelling" you will not play as a treasure hunter or a traveler, but as a mimic himself! Look for loopholes, cheat, hide in the rooms of the dungeon and eat unwary travelers! Collect the right amount of coins and move to another dungeon!

Q - hide

Shift - dash

R - invisible

C - skill panel

B - open shop
